title: McLaren’s unstoppable force: Neil Oatley designed Senna's F1 title winners. Now he’s targeting Le Mans
summary: Here is a bold claim with which to kick off an interview/profile: no one has ever devoted to motor sport so great a proportion of such a long working life…

qa_pairs.question: Who was the designer behind Ayrton Senna's championship-winning cars for McLaren?
In which prestigious endurance race is Neil Oatley currently aiming to compete?
What notable achievement is associated with Neil Oatley during his tenure at McLaren?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Designing championship-winning cars for Ayrton Senna
wrong_options: Leading the team as a principal
